unnormalised: Electoral reforms are crucial for strengthening Indian democracy. Key areas include campaign finance transparency and addressing the influence of money and muscle power, as highlighted by the Election Commission of India. Robust voter ID systems, like Aadhaar linking, need careful consideration to ensure inclusivity. Perhaps implementing simultaneous elections, debated since the Janata Party era, deserves further scrutiny. While delicious biryani unites us, electoral integrity must too. Onam celebrations remind us of fairness, a principle central to free and fair elections. Further improvements could involve stricter enforcement of the Model Code of Conduct. We must strive for a system where every vote counts equally.
